messages.subject: unschool groups
messages.msgSnippet: we dont fit  in either~ we homeschool group hop! but so far we dont stick with anyone..... but most of my own life i have not fit in and then in my 30 s i
messages.messageBody:
we dont fit in either~ we homeschool group hop! but so far we dont stick
with anyone..... but most of my own life i have not fit in and then in my
30's i realized i didnt want to!!!!!!! SO my kids have wonderful associations
with my piano/voice students, some neighbors, friends that stop over,
babysitters who "grew up" with us, restaurant and store people we frequent!
IT works out!!! !maybe they will find some wonderful people like you to hang
out with too!!!! THis list got so positive today! YAY!!!!! support and
encouragement.........Denise
